title: Handle League Expansion
description: A league is expanding and adding a new team. An administrator must manage the expansion draft.

tasks.description: Request all existing teams to submit their list of 'protected' players who are ineligible for the expansion draft.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the protected lists from all teams.

tasks.description: Compile a list of all available, unprotected players for the new team to choose from.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the official list of players available in the expansion draft.

tasks.description: Facilitate the expansion draft, allowing the new team to select players from the list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the new team's selections in real time.
